cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 535 miles SSE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking northwest toward the middle Texas coast with steady intensification expected.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Middle Texas coast between Port Mansfield and San Luis Pass (near Port O'Connor)

port.name: Port of Greater Baton Rouge, LA

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch: Port Mansfield TX to High Island TX; Hurricane Watch: Port Mansfield to San Luis Pass; Tropical Storm Watch: Mouth of Rio Grande to Port Mansfield and San Luis Pass to High Island
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coastline from Port Mansfield to High Island, with impacts possibly extending into southwestern Louisiana
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤14%) of tropical-storm-force winds late weekend to early next week
weather_observation.rainfall: Bands from Harvey may deliver 4–8 inches of rain to south-central Louisiana beginning this weekend, leading to flash and river flooding near the port.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Possible inland river flooding and prolonged logistical disruptions due to persistent heavy rain.
